Package <Unnamed>

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuctionHandler
    Handler for database requests regarding auctions.
    AuctionListServlet
    AuctionList Servlet, handles the backend logic for AuctionList URL
    BidHandler
    Class for handling all database logic regarding bidding
    CreateEnglishAuctionServlet
    CreateEnglishAuction Servlet, handles the backend logic for CreateEnglishAuction URL
    DatabaseHandler
    Class of static constants used for referencing database connection information
    EnglishAuctionServlet
    EnglishAuction Servlet, handles the backend logic for EnglishAuction URL
    LoginHandler
    Class login, used to query the database with the user requested username,hashed password.
    LoginServlet
    Login Servlet to collect the user submitted form data and call various methods to validate the user data.
    LogoutServlet
    Logout Servlet, handles the backend logic for Logout URL
    RegisterHandler
    Register Class, used to connect and query the database the check if the request username/email the user wishes to register, also provides functionality to insert the requested user into the database.
    RegisterServlet
    Register Servlet is used to collect the user submitted form data and call various methods to validate the data.
